panels.description:
Shows the Status of each Brick in a Host.  
1->Started, 10->Stopped
panels.title: Brick Status

panels.description: Memory Available is the sum of memory free and memory cached
panels.title: Memory Available

panels.description: The memory utilization threshold is set to 80%. Reaching or exceeding this value displays an orange horizontal line indicating high memory usage.
panels.title: Memory Utilization
